subsection.name: Invocation
subsection.p: The parser can be invoked for processing whole queries or fragments of queries. First a new parser must be instantiated or an existing one re-initialized with the query or fragment of a query to be processed. There are then a number of convenience methods for executing a parse, depending upon what is required to be returned: DOM, XML text, or XMLBean. You can ask for the text to be indented.
